016package de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.contract;
017
018import static de.cuioss.tools.collect.CollectionLiterals.mutableList;
019import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
020
021import java.util.List;
022import java.util.Optional;
023
024import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.api.TestContract;
025import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.api.contracts.VerifyBuilder;
026import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.objects.BuilderInstantiator;
027import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.objects.ParameterizedInstantiator;
028import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.objects.RuntimeProperties;
029import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.objects.impl.BuilderConstructorBasedInstantiator;
030import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.objects.impl.BuilderFactoryBasedInstantiator;
031import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.objects.impl.BuilderParameterizedInstantiator;
032import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.property.PropertyMetadata;
033import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.property.PropertySupport;
034import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.util.AnnotationHelper;
035import de.cuioss.tools.logging.CuiLogger;
036import de.cuioss.tools.reflect.MoreReflection;
037
038/**
039 * Defines basic tests for builder. In essence it will try to create a builder
040 * with a minimal set (required only) and one with all properties set. It sets
041 * the properties, build the actual object and verifies whether the properties
042 * are set correctly
043 *
044 * @author Oliver Wolff
045 * @param <T> identifying the type of objects to be tested
046 */
047public class BuilderContractImpl<T> implements TestContract<T> {
048
049    private static final CuiLogger log = new CuiLogger(BuilderContractImpl.class);
050
051    private final BuilderInstantiator<T> builderInstantiator;
052
053    private final RuntimeProperties runtimeProperties;
054
055    /** The usually chosen name for the actual build method. */
056    public static final String DEFAULT_BUILD_METHOD_NAME = "build";
057
058    /** The usually chosen name for a factory builder method. */
059    public static final String DEFAULT_BUILDER_FACTORY_METHOD_NAME = "builder";
060
061    /**
062     * @param instantiator      must not be null
063     * @param runtimeProperties must not be null
064     */
065    public BuilderContractImpl(final BuilderInstantiator<T> instantiator, final RuntimeProperties runtimeProperties) {
066        super();
067        builderInstantiator = requireNonNull(instantiator, "builderInstantiator must not be null");
068        this.runtimeProperties = requireNonNull(runtimeProperties, "runtimeProperties must not be null.");
069    }
070
071    @Override
072    public void assertContract() {
073
074        final var builder = new StringBuilder("Verifying ");
075        builder.append(getClass().getName()).append("\nWith configuration: ").append(builderInstantiator.toString());
076        log.info(builder.toString());
077        setAndVerifyProperties(runtimeProperties.getRequiredProperties());
078        setAndVerifyProperties(runtimeProperties.getAllProperties());
079        shouldFailOnMissingRequiredAttributes();
080    }
081
082    private void setAndVerifyProperties(final List<PropertyMetadata> propertiesToBeChecked) {
083        final var properties = propertiesToBeChecked.stream().map(PropertySupport::new).toList();
084
085        properties.forEach(PropertySupport::generateTestValue);
086
087        final var builder = builderInstantiator.newBuilderInstance();
088        for (final PropertySupport support : properties) {
089            support.apply(builder);
090        }
091        final var built = builderInstantiator.build(builder);
092
093        for (final PropertySupport support : properties) {
094            if (support.isReadable()) {
095                support.assertValueSet(built);
096            }
097        }
098    }
099
100    private void shouldFailOnMissingRequiredAttributes() {
101        if (runtimeProperties.getRequiredProperties().isEmpty()) {
102            return;
103        }
104        for (final PropertyMetadata property : runtimeProperties.getRequiredProperties()) {
105            final List<PropertyMetadata> requiredMinusOne = mutableList(runtimeProperties.getRequiredProperties());
106            requiredMinusOne.remove(property);
107            var failed = false;
108            try {
109                setAndVerifyProperties(requiredMinusOne);
110                failed = true;
111            } catch (final AssertionError e) {
112                // Expected: Should have been thrown
113            }
114            if (failed) {
115                throw new AssertionError("Property is marked as required but the builder accepts if it is missing: "
116                        + property.toString());
117            }
118        }
119    }
120
121    @Override
122    public ParameterizedInstantiator<T> getInstantiator() {
123        return new BuilderParameterizedInstantiator<>(builderInstantiator, runtimeProperties);
124    }
125
126    /**
127     * Factory method for creating an instance of {@link BuilderContractImpl}
128     * depending on the given parameter
129     *
130     * @param beanType                identifying the type to be tested. Must not be
131     *                                null
132     * @param annotated               the annotated unit-test-class. It is expected
133     *                                to be annotated with {@link VerifyBuilder},
134     *                                otherwise the method will return
135     *                                {@link Optional#empty()}
136     * @param initialPropertyMetadata identifying the complete set of
137     *                                {@link PropertyMetadata}, where the actual
138     *                                {@link PropertyMetadata} for the bean tests
139     *                                will be filtered by using the attributes
140     *                                defined within {@link VerifyBuilder}. Must not
141     *                                be null.
142     * @return an instance Of {@link BeanPropertyContractImpl} in case all
143     *         requirements for the parameters are correct, otherwise it will return
144     *         {@link Optional#empty()}
145     */
146    public static final <T> Optional<BuilderContractImpl<T>> createBuilderTestContract(final Class<T> beanType,
147            final Class<?> annotated, final List<PropertyMetadata> initialPropertyMetadata) {
148
149        requireNonNull(beanType, "beantype must not be null");
150        requireNonNull(annotated, "annotated must not be null");
151        requireNonNull(initialPropertyMetadata, "initialPropertyMetadata must not be null");
152
153        final Optional<VerifyBuilder> config = MoreReflection.extractAnnotation(annotated, VerifyBuilder.class);
154
155        if (config.isEmpty()) {
156            log.debug("No annotation of type BuilderTestContract available on class: " + annotated);
157            return Optional.empty();
158        }
159        final var metadata = AnnotationHelper.handleMetadataForBuilderTest(annotated, initialPropertyMetadata);
160
161        final var contract = config.get();
162        BuilderInstantiator<T> instantiator;
163        if (VerifyBuilder.class.equals(contract.builderClass())) {
164            if (VerifyBuilder.class.equals(contract.builderFactoryProvidingClass())) {
165                instantiator = new BuilderFactoryBasedInstantiator<>(beanType, contract.builderFactoryMethodName(),
166                        contract.builderMethodName());
167            } else {
168                instantiator = new BuilderFactoryBasedInstantiator<>(contract.builderFactoryProvidingClass(),
169                        contract.builderFactoryMethodName(), contract.builderMethodName());
170            }
171        } else {
172            instantiator = new BuilderConstructorBasedInstantiator<>(contract.builderClass(),
173                    contract.builderMethodName());
174        }
175
176        return Optional.of(new BuilderContractImpl<>(instantiator, new RuntimeProperties(metadata)));
177    }
178}
